Introduction

SooMin is a South Korean singer under MODHAUS.

On August 8, 2022, SooMin was introduced as the sixth member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She made her debut with the first ten members of the group on February 13, 2023, with the mini album "ASSEMBLE".

As a member of tripleS, SooMin was placed in the sub-units +(KR)ystal Eyes, ACID EYES, EVOLution, and Hatchi!.
